author: b.ramesh
title: FetaChain: Renovating the Foodchain
description: Fetachain aims to eliminate adulteration, wastage and profit prioritization that exists in the global food chain using Industry 4.0 tech
solution: A decentralized supply chain tracking, traceability and transparency solution by the integration of Blockchain, AI, IoT, and automation tech
experience: We are a small group of data scientists, engineers and developers with extensive experience in state-of-the-art tech in respective domains
